element.name: Label
element.label: Select the general plan to which the subscriber will change (transition to the plan corresponding to its technology)

element.name: TariffPlan
element.label: Select the general plan to which the subscriber will change (transition to the plan corresponding to its technology)

method.name: cwLeafInitAction$BoltOnTypePickList
cwLeafInitAction$model
awardTypeSelected

setBoltOnTypesSelected
addSimpleAwardOperationOnBoltOn
method.script: var SimpleAwardOperationOnBoltOn = this.model.AwardOperationOnBoltonDS.AOOBSAOpOnBoltOnArrDS.ListDS; cm_spoc.addListElement(this,SimpleAwardOperationOnBoltOn,"cm_spoc.forms.SimpleAwardOperationOnBoltOnIteratorUI",'base_SimpleAwardOperationOnBoltO',"SimpleAwardOperationOnBoltOnIterator");

method.name: deleteSimpleAwardOperationOnBoltOn
method.script: this.model.AwardOperationOnBoltonDS.AOOBSAOpOnBoltOnArrDS = cm_spoc.removeListElements(this ,this.model.AwardOperationOnBoltonDS.AOOBSAOpOnBoltOnArrDS,"List","SimpleAwardOperationOnBoltOnIterator");

method.name: FinderTopUpOriginReferenceDialog
setTopUpOrigin
method.script: this.parentUI.model.AwardTopUpAssignationDS.TopUpOrigin = selected.itemCode;

method.name: FinderTariffPlanReferenceDialog
setTariffPlan
method.script: this.parentUI.model.AwardDestinationPlanChangeDS.TariffPlan = selected.itemCode;

method.name: addSimpleAwardOperationOnCyclicAction
